author: Katherine Rodriguez, Katherine Rodriguez
title: Florida Man with Coronavirus Credits Drug Touted by Trump for Saving His Life
description: A Florida man with coronavirus claims an anti-malaria drug, touted by President Donald Trump as a possible treatment for the virus, saved his life.
content:
A Florida man with coronavirus claims an anti-malaria drug, touted by President Donald Trump as a possible treatment for the virus, saved his life.
Rio Giardinieri, 52, told Fox 11 Los Angeles that he suffered from a cough, headache, back pain, and fatigue a… [+2306 chars]
